inlineContent.text: Don’t subclass or create instances of this class. The system automatically creates an appropriate background task object whenever it triggers a background task. This object is passed to your app delegate’s
method. Use the provided background task object to identify and manage the background task.
In watchOS 9 and later, SwiftUI Background tasks are the preferred way to handle background tasks and interactions. For more information, see
